NoiseTube is not yet calibrated for your phone model. Generic setting in use, measurements are likely inaccurate. New calibration settings are downloaded automatically when they become available.

NoiseTube is currently not calibrated for your phone model. Brand default setting in use, measurements may be inaccurate. New calibration settings are downloaded automatically when they become available.
Using calibration setting for your phone model for best accuracy.
Resume
Enable manual tagging
Session added to your schedule
Session removed from your schedule
Your current track do not have the minimum (30) amount of measurements. The NoiseTube server will not process this track. Select \"OK\" to continue measuring."
Button to enable manual measurement tagging.
Button to disable manual measurement tagging.
Measurement Warning
Please hold your phone upside down for optimal measuring.
You are not logged in. Measurements will not be uploaded to the website, and no maps will be generated. To change this behaviour, please login.
You need to be logged in to start measuring. To change this behaviour, please to to settings.
You need to enable GPS to map measurements. To change this behaviour, please go to phone settings. \"Not store measurements\".
Your measurements will be save locally, because your device do not have an internet connection.
